p: Primary fetal bovine testes (FBT) cells were prepared according to standard techniques ( 20). These were used for construction and selection of the recombinants and were propagated in a 1:1 combination of Dulbecco's modified Eagle's medium (DMEM) and Ham's F12 medium (Gibco, USA) containing 8% FCS and antibiotics (100 μg/ml penicillin, 100 μg/ml streptomycin and 250 μg/ml amphotericin B) (Lonza, USA).
